impact-statement: Quantitative analysis of protein and mRNA expression across a minimally perturbed cell cycle in human myeloid cells has identified myeloid-specific and cell cycle-regulated gene expression, including examples of isoform- and phosphorylation-specific regulation, with all data made available in a searchable, online database.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.

aff3.institution: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

aff1.dept: Centre for Gene Regulation and Expression, College of Life Sciences
